basic_info.description: I'm Nika Skeba. Real person. I'm working with newest front-end frameworks like Angular, React and Vue. As a highly skilled MBA graduate and experienced product marketing expert, I bring a proven track record of success in driving customer growth through effective use of CRM. My ability to gain buy-in from stakeholders and upper management allows me to effectively execute on targeted campaigns, making me a valuable asset to any organization. My expertise in product marketing, coupled with my strong communication skills and strategic thinking, make me well-equipped to drive growth and impact business results.
